notes: Packet-008 wrapper script completed with workflow_scenarios case_count=355 pass_count=355.
Forensics artifact index includes linalg_differential_cases, linalg_adversarial_cases, and linalg_packet_workflow_script entries.

workflow_gate_runs.command: rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_workflow_scenario_gate -- --log-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-008/workflow_scenario_packet008_opt_e2e.jsonl --artifact-index-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-008/workflow_scenario_packet008_opt_artifact_index.json --report-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-008/workflow_scenario_packet008_opt_reliability.json --retries 0 --flake-budget 0 --coverage-floor 1.0
notes: Direct gate invocation produced packet-local replay artifacts under artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-008.
Strict and hardened scenario expectations remained green for both linalg_packet_replay and linalg_packet_hostile_guardrails.

quality_gates.command: rch exec -- cargo test -p fnp-conformance workflow_scenario_suite_is_green -- --nocapture
rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_test_contract_gate
rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_security_gate

notes: Workflow step logs include fixture_id, seed, mode, env_fingerprint, artifact_refs, and reason_code via WorkflowScenarioLogEntry.
Packet-008 scenarios execute real linalg_fixture_case differential/adversarial operations instead of metadata-only references.
Packet-008 wrapper script provides deterministic paths for replay logs, reliability reports, and artifact index outputs.
